#### Example 3.1 

$y = |x|$

<button class="show-button" target="1">Show</button> 
<div id="btn1" class="content-div hidden-content">
$$
	\begin{align}
		0 &= TR - TC \\
		 TC &= TR \\
		TR &= TC  \\
		1.20(q) &= 0.50(q) + 10,000  \\
		1.20(q) -  0.50(q) &= 10,000 \\
		 0.70(q) &= 10,000 \\
		\left[\frac{1}{0.70}\right] 0.70(q) &= 10,000 \left[\frac{1}{0.70}\right] \\
		 q &= \frac{10,000}{0.70} \\
		q &= 14,285
	\end{align}
$$
</div>
